title: 高性能PC導入によるAI検証
description: Ryzen AI 7 350 + RTX 5070 を用いたローカルAI基盤の検証報告スライド

slides.title: 高性能PC導入によるAI検証
slides.subtitle: ローカルAI基盤実現性確認
slides.imagePrompt: Japanese business presentation slide: 'High-Performance PC Introduction - AI Verification'. Handwritten style title slide with elegant typography. Features a sophisticated Ryzen AI 7 350 + RTX 5070 PC illustration in sketch-style. Subtle circuit pattern background. Professional yet creative handwritten aesthetic. Text: PC導入によるAI検証 (in handwriting). Color scheme: deep navy, cyan accents, warm gold highlights. High quality, clean composition.

slides.title: PCスペック
slides.subtitle: 検証用マシンの構成
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten style technical specification slide. CPU: Ryzen AI 7 350, GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070, RAM: 64GB DDR5. Display as hand-drawn boxes with specifications. Add small icons for each component (CPU chip, GPU core, RAM module). Sketch-style badges and checkmarks. Subtle grid background. Colors: navy blue, cyan tech highlights, warm accents. Handwriting font style.

slides.title: 検証概要
slides.subtitle: 目的と前提条件
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten presentation slide: '検証概要 - 目的と前提'. Hand-drawn bullet points and icons. Main purpose: Realization check of local AI infrastructure without cloud. Secondary objectives: Practical evaluation of chat support, summarization, code completion. LM Studio platform illustration. Sketch-style diagrams. Handwritten annotations. Colors: navy, cyan, gold accents.

slides.title: 検証環境・ツール
slides.subtitle: OS・ハードウェア・LM Studio
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten technical environment slide. Shows LM Studio logo with hand-drawn architecture diagram. OS/Hardware section, LM Studio tools section, GGUF format model illustration. Hand-sketched boxes, arrows connecting components, handwritten labels. Gemma3 and gpt-oss-20B model icons. Sketch-style aesthetic. Colors: navy blue, cyan, warm gold for emphasis.

slides.title: LM Studio設定
slides.subtitle: 軽量・高品質モデル構成
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten configuration slide. LM Studio settings display with hand-drawn boxes. Gemma3 model: lightweight, fast response. gpt-oss-20B: high quality, long Japanese text. Comparison table in handwriting style. Model download & management, Local inference, OpenAI compatible API icons. Sketch aesthetic with professional layout.

slides.title: 検証シナリオ
slides.subtitle: メール生成・要約・翻訳・API検証
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten slide showing 4 verification scenarios. 1) Email generation - envelope and pen icon sketch. 2) Email summarization - document with bullet points. 3) Japanese translation - language exchange icon. 4) API verification - server connection diagram. Each scenario hand-drawn with explanatory text. Handwritten style annotations. Colors: navy, cyan, warm accents.

slides.title: 結果サマリ：メール生成・要約
slides.subtitle: Gemma3 vs gpt-oss-20B 定性的評価
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten comparison slide. Results summary for email generation and summarization. Two-column layout: Gemma3 on left, gpt-oss-20B on right. Hand-sketched rating bars, checkmarks for strengths, stars for quality indicators. Email example snippets in light background boxes. Handwritten evaluation notes. Color: navy background, cyan/gold accents, warm highlight colors.

slides.title: 結果サマリ：翻訳・API
slides.subtitle: 翻訳精度とAPI経由検証
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten slide covering translation results and API verification. Japanese-English translation quality comparison. API compatibility diagram with OpenAI endpoint illustration. Hand-drawn checkmarks for success metrics, JSON structure examples in sketch boxes. Handwritten annotations for findings. Colors: navy, cyan API highlights, warm success indicators. Sketch style.

slides.title: モデル別所感・総評
slides.subtitle: Gemma3は即時レスポンス、gpt-oss-20Bは高品質
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten summary slide presenting key insights. Gemma3: instant response, lightweight, suitable for daily tasks. gpt-oss-20B: high quality, better for critical decisions but resource-intensive. Hand-drawn comparison chart, lightning bolt for speed, crown/star for quality. Practical workflow diagram. Handwritten conclusion notes. Colors: navy, cyan, gold accents, warm highlights for emphasis.

slides.title: リソース利用と運用上の注意
slides.subtitle: GPU/メモリ・ストレージ・セキュリティ
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten operational guidelines slide. GPU/Memory management tips with hand-sketched monitoring charts. Storage requirements for model files illustration. Security & privacy: local-only processing diagram. Hand-drawn warning icons, checkmarks, resource graphs. Handwritten best practices annotations. Colors: navy, cyan technical elements, warm warning highlights.

slides.title: 今後の検討事項
slides.subtitle: RAG・複数ユーザー・モデル拡充・監視
slides.imagePrompt: Handwritten future roadmap slide. 4 main topics: RAG integration with hand-drawn database icons, Multi-user support network diagram, Model lineup expansion with different model type icons, Monitoring and logging dashboard sketch. Hand-drawn roadmap timeline with milestone markers. Handwritten annotations for each item. Colors: navy, cyan, gold, warm accent colors.
